context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"a1b64e","name":"No keyboard trap standard navigation","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks if it is possible to use standard keyboard navigation to navigate through all content on a web page without becoming trapped in any element.\n","accessibility_requirements":null,"input_aspects":["DOM Tree","CSS Styling"],"authors":["Dagfinn Rømen","Geir Sindre Fossøy","Malin Øvrebø","Shadi Abou-Zahra","Carlos Duarte","Anne Thyme Nørregaard","Stein Erik Skotkjerra"]}
